Uses of Class
hc.server.ui.Mlet

  • Packages that use Mlet 
    Package Description
    hc.server.ui  

    • Uses of Mlet in hc.server.ui

      Subclasses of Mlet in hc.server.ui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HTMLMlet
      HTMLMlet is a JPanel, which contains JComponents and present them as HTML on mobile (not snapshot), you can set CSS for these JComponents.

      Tip : if you need load and execute javascript, please use ScriptPanel.
      Methods in hc.server.ui with parameters of type Mlet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Dialog.goMlet(Mlet toMlet, String targetOfMlet)
      dismiss current dialog, and go and open a Mlet or HTMLMlet (which is probably created by ProjectContext.eval(String)).
      void Mlet.goMlet(Mlet toMlet, String targetOfMlet, boolean isAutoReleaseCurrentMlet)
      go and open a Mlet or HTMLMlet (which is probably created by ProjectContext.eval(String)).
      void ProjectContext.goMletWhenInSession(Mlet toMlet, String targetOfMlet)
      Warning : when in project level it will do nothing.
